predicate.note: Frames file for 'mold' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment.

role.descr: end state, if different from arg1

example.name: the one example
example.text: CNN's viewer habits have been molded [*-1] by its format.

example.name: all args
example.text: John's sullen insolence molded Mary into the violent abuser she is today.
example.arg: the violent abuser she is today
